rules_text:
Unrelenting [i](When this creature dies, if it wasn't a token, you may discard a card to create a token that's a copy of it with haste.)[/i]
When Processing Revenant enters, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
flavor_text: [i]“The soul is long gone. Best I can do is clean the rest of the corpse and make it useful.”[/i]
